## Carry Recipe
_Reinforced Robin’s Hip Carry – Base Size – 2 Traditional Sling Passes + Cross Pass_
Fold wrap in half lengthwise and place middle in corsage position
Drape tails around back diagonally and thread through loop
Slide baby in both Traditional Sling Passes and tighten
Split wrap and take closest tail over baby and under leg for Cross Pass
Other tail comes down around waist and tie in back
